TimelineEntries.Title: WT40

Conditions: The office of Prime Minister must be held by the same player during the whole cycle.
A positive cult of personality without major opposition must be established around the Prime Minister’s person and its effects must be visible throughout the whole world.
The Prime Minister must faithfully and lawfully execute all of his duties at all times.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the sitting Prime Minister may choose to become President and to add one twist to the server concept. (Agreement with Game Masters required)

Conditions: At least one religion must be founded and the majority of active citizens at the time of the victory ceremony must be followers of any religion.

Religions must be fictitious and positive, charge their followers a membership fee, build at least one prestigious church building, appoint members into fitting religious offices and at least conduct minor role play supporting it.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the religion with the most followers at the end of the cycle becomes the state religion with a tax funded government office to facilitate endeavors typical for that religion.

Conditions: A monumental spaceport featuring a command center and a rocket must be built.
A library with at least 5 copies of each Skill Book must be established in the Federal University.
The population on the server needs to achieve at least 35 “Global Level-Ups” (visible in the tooltip for the specialty) for each of the following specialties: Electronics, Industry
Rewards: For the following cycle, the following specialties are already researched and their Skill Scrolls available in limited numbers right from the start: Baking, Basic Engineering, Carpentry, Cooking, Fertilizers, Masonry, Milling Pottery, Shipwright, Smelting and Tailoring

Conditions: At least four states must be founded and have an active Governor during the victory ceremony.
At least four states qualifying for the former condition must have reached a “Culture Including Children“ value of at least 250.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the governors of all states fulfilling the conditions are allowed to view the map and get to place their state at a location all of them agree on before the server starts. They are not allowed to share any information about the map.

Conditions: All buildings in the government district of Unica must be built to be iconic and merge their gameplay functionality with aesthetic and roleplay supporting decorations in a manner that makes the buildings look like a usable prestigious real-life counterpart.
The Presidential Square in Unica must be upgraded to a monumental Presidential Palace and feature a realistic civil defense bunker for the general public underground.
The world must achieve a “Total Culture Worldwide” value of at least 5000.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the recipes for T4 building materials and furniture are changed to make their costs on par with T3 materials and furniture.

NotableEvents: Twist from domination victory of WT39 was to replace all main highways with canals
Lots of valentines themed roleplay
Unica was especially quiet this time as there were alot of cool towns for people to live in
Starting this cycle, bank loan debt carries over to the next cycle

Conditions: At least four states must be founded and have an active Governor during the victory ceremony.
At least four states qualifying for the former condition must have reached a “Culture Including Children“ value of at least 250.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the governors of all states fulfilling the conditions are allowed to view the map and get to place their state at a location all of them agree on before the server starts. They are not allowed to share any information about the map.

Conditions: All buildings in the government district of Unica must be built to be iconic and merge their gameplay functionality with aesthetic and roleplay supporting decorations in a manner that makes the buildings look like a usable prestigious real-life counterpart.
The Presidential Square in Unica must be upgraded to a monumental Presidential Palace and feature a realistic civil defense bunker for the general public underground.
The world must achieve a “Total Culture Worldwide” value of at least 5000.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the recipes for T4 building materials and furniture are changed to make their costs on par with T3 materials and furniture.

NotableEvents: PirateBug started a religion of Arborists where members had to face a number of tree-related trials in order to advance the ranks
Domination victory achieved by Elmeye

TimelineEntries.Title: WT38
NotableEvents: Third playtest on Eco 10.0
DRs were removed for this cycle
Company income scaling reduction given to gov instead of removed from circulation
Culture points were awarded to or deducted from properties by GMs based on aesthetics

TimelineEntries.Title: WT37
NotableEvents: Second playtest on Eco 10.0
Ore distribution was reworked and ores were generally much sparser
Housing xp calculations were adjusted to make hotels less powerful

TimelineEntries.Title: WT36
NotableEvents: First playtest on Eco 10.0
Many issues at the start like not being able to build, logging in as another person, losing citizenship and regular server crashes
Parliament was dissolved mid-cycle at request of Ztae, the Prime Minister at the time
Major energy crisis later on in the cycle due to power balance changes and 10x increase of pumpjack drilling time

TimelineEntries.Title: WC1
NotableEvents: First ever official open speedrun event
Meteor shot down in just over 24 hours

TimelineEntries.Title: WT35

Conditions: The office of Prime Minister must be held by the same player during the whole cycle.
A positive cult of personality without major opposition must be established around the Prime Minister’s person and its effects must be visible throughout the whole world.
The Prime Minister must faithfully and lawfully execute all of his duties at all times.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the sitting Prime Minister may choose to become President and to add one twist to the server concept. (Agreement with Game Masters required)

Conditions: A spaceport carrying a rocket must be built.
A library with at least 5 copies of each Skill Book must be established in the Federal University.
The population on the server needs to achieve at least 35 “Global Level-Ups” (visible in the tooltip for the specialty) for each of the following specialties: Electronics, Industry
Rewards: In the following cycle, the Federal University starts with 1.000 pieces of each Basic Research Paper and the Minister of Education may continue his office until the first general election ends.

Conditions: All four states must build iconic embassy buildings in Unica.
All four states must have had a Governor throughout the vast majority of the cycle and have one during the victory ceremony.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the currently sitting Governors may collegially determine the borders, location and size of the four states after having seen the new map.

Conditions: At least one religion must be founded and the majority of active citizens at the time of the victory ceremony must be followers of any religion.

Religions must be fictitious and positive, charge their followers a membership fee, build at least one prestigious church building, appoint members into fitting religious offices and at least conduct minor role play supporting it.
Rewards: For the next cycle, the religion with the most followers at the end of the cycle becomes state-religion with a tax funded government office.

Conditions: All buildings in the government district of Unica must be built to be iconic and merge their gameplay functionality with aesthetic and roleplay supporting decorations in a manner that makes the buildings look like a usable prestigious real-life counterpart.
The Presidential Square in Unica must be upgraded to a monumental Presidential Palace and feature a realistic civil defense bunker for the general public underground.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the recipes for T4 building materials and furniture are changed to make their costs on par with T3 materials and furniture.

NotableEvents: The state religion was funded by a constitutional labor tax
Pepzi was PM for most of the cycle
Food shortage in first week due to expensive LCPs that limited farming
96dwilliams tried to improve the EP law but it backfired and eventually was reverted
There was an energy crisis when nobody sold green energy to the gov, the grid was powered privately by Odin's Green Powerplant for a while

Conditions: All four states must build iconic embassy buildings in Unica.
All four states must have had a Governor throughout the vast majority of the cycle and have one during the victory ceremony.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the currently sitting Governors may collegially determine the borders, location and size of the four states after having seen the new map.

Conditions: At least one religion must be founded and the majority of active citizens at the time of the victory ceremony must be followers of any religion.

The Presidential Square in Unica must be upgraded to a monumental Presidential Palace and feature a realistic civil defense bunker for the general public underground.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the recipes for T4 building materials and furniture are changed to make their costs on par with T3 materials and furniture.

NotableEvents: Due to issues in the playtest build, tree cutting was bugged for the first few days, and so the GMs spawned stockpiles of logs at key locations for people to use
Another bug caused people to become small when using a wood cart
Upgrades had a new set of recipes using research papers and generic labor
For a long time Jabroni held the monopoly on Fertilizers, making him very wealthy as one of the upgrade recipes needed fert papers
The government tried to raise rent tax to 40% but there were riots so they had to back down
Cinea and Naarke started a state backed otter-based religion
ShadowTheBuilder built many awesome buildings including various dedications to The Great Otter
BeleHoover built the Garbage Mountain Museum displaying over 18,000 pieces of garbage and signage with real-world facts about garbage pollution
The Glassholes (Ed & Racman) built a crazy glass maze

NotableEvents: All state and title names were themed based on UK naming to honour the passing of Queen Elizabeth II
An incredible replica of Buckingham Palace was built in London (Unica)

NotableEvents: First playtest on Eco 9.6
Most laws crashed the server at the start, there was no tax for a long time
LCP sales were the govt's only income
First cycle with food decay
Company income scaling changed to 20% mid-cycle, which upset alot of people
A dice was rolled to give two days extra time at the end
Another chunk corrupted, this time in Moria

TimelineEntries.Title: WT31

Conditions: The office of Prime Minister must be held by the same player throughout the whole cycle.
A personal cult around the Prime Minister must be established and visible throughout the country.
The Prime Minister must have acted within the boundaries of the constitution at all times.
Rewards: For the following cycle, the sitting Prime Minister may choose to become President and to add one twist to the server concept. (Agreement with Game Masters required)

Conditions: A spaceport carrying a rocket must be built.
A library with at least 5 copies of each Skill Book must be established in the Federal University.

Rewards: For the following cycle, the recipes for T4 building materials and furniture are changed to make their costs on par with T3 materials and furniture.

NotableEvents: XP turned way down, took several days to get second star
Unica was round and not levelled
Full government house at the start
JnPox tried to implement a very controversial monetary policy
A chunk in snow city corrupted and the area had to be cordoned off

NotableEvents: Second playtest on Eco 9.5
Unica had a moat which everyone loved
TserMatt made a newspaper called 'The Verbose Tiger'
24/7, a tree cutting company, got sued for cutting trees
Carts were buggy for a while and couldn't be interacted with, leading to a cart graveyard
The last week had mini meteors leading up to the end

TimelineEntries.Title: WT29
NotableEvents: First playtest on Eco 9.5
Elmeye was Prime Minister
Shadow The Builder built an epic government building

TimelineEntries.Title: WT28
NotableEvents: Cycle finished early for playtest

TimelineEntries.Title: WT27
NotableEvents: Mountain Unica lead to elevated highways worldwide
Plant fiber was nerfed heavily
First two PMs elected did not come to work
Daniel and Elmeye as Mayor and Deputy Mayor
BlueDagger built a floating island and a glass water tunnel

TimelineEntries.Title: WT26
NotableEvents: Some groups reached a point of almost 100% taxation on all sales and transfers
Onyx served 4 terms as PM due to low gov interest
1st week Land claim paper prices fluctuated like an ECG diagram
Elmeye built the Starship Enterprise-E

TimelineEntries.Title: WT25
NotableEvents: Gov was flooded with lawsuits and ragequits in early weeks

TimelineEntries.Title: WT24
NotableEvents: A lot of stuff went wrong on this cycle
It was a disaster
The Emission Permit System broke
Food values were changed and people starved in the streets of Unica
From this point on, cooks were always going to be rich
We got new endgame goals
No longer just a computer lab
We needed to build bunkers, global power, lasers to be divided among the states

TimelineEntries.Title: WT23
NotableEvents: The capital was one of the most beautiful we ever had, with an amazing mayor giving subsidies for everything possible from building materials to food and furniture
Philip Jay was president
100 cart revolution protest.
Dreamstate was promoted to GM

TimelineEntries.Title: WT22
NotableEvents: Dreamstate/Elmeye got sued
Vogeldreck made a race track
rev made a Sears Tower

TimelineEntries.Title: WT21
NotableEvents: First cycle with Donation Receipts
The competition was cutthroat and fierce
People got disqualified
Kaapo built epic monument
Also something something HippoCo and 6k electronics scroll
Elmeye was promoted to GM

TimelineEntries.Title: WT20
NotableEvents: Daniel PM first half. In this cycle of White Tiger we had Land Claim Papers with a variable price
The bank director could raise and lower the price of the LCP as they saw fit
It also had a new version of the Emission Permit system where you could purchase the amount of permits you thought you'd need
ELAN and LKAB had around 80% of the EPs until the bank was forced to sell their Emission Permits
There was a stampede at the Emission Permit shop when this was announced
Roads were 4 claims wide

TimelineEntries.Title: WT19
NotableEvents: Erato was a friendly player who took the banking system to the extreme
Paying loans with new loans
Buying up a lot of property in the city while doing nothing with them
Selling cars filled with tailings
It was also the first cycle where we had Emission Permits
You could buy and sell permits to other people and use them to pay for the pollution you created
People went into 100.000 negative EP and eventually got bailed out by something trivial like 20 cents on the Dollar (we had Dollar back then)
Also Valheim released and a lot of people left
There was also a big trial when BasTheBear was caught doing naughty things in chat
Riots ensued in the streets of Unica until a fair verdict was found
After many hours of deliberation the judges came to the conclusion that BasTheBear should work off his debt to society by digging a tunnel through a mountain for 10 hours

TimelineEntries.Title: WT18
NotableEvents: This cycle introduced labour tax
People hated it so much they went into politics and deleted any remains of this law and it was mostly a banned term from that point out
Thomasfn was renamed Thomas the Tax engine
Daniel was promoted to GM
Also there were christmas trees and reindeer elk

TimelineEntries.Title: WT17
NotableEvents: Nemo - Mr Magic was mayor
ELAN had 99% of all money in the world and only bought bison carcass

TimelineEntries.Title: WT16
NotableEvents: Where a law made half the population disappear with 1 law
Both ELAN and LKAB got fudged on that one
The 2 biggest groups were competing to shoot down the meteor
A law was made that only allowed the PM to do this

TimelineEntries.Title: WT15
NotableEvents: This cycle was not public
The 9.0 playtesters + those who bought the bigger ECO supporter packs were able to play
Nemo - Mr Magic pulled trigger on lasers

TimelineEntries.Title: WT14
NotableEvents: Jungle Capital
Hiroyugane(GM) was PM most of the time.

TimelineEntries.Title: WT13
NotableEvents: Capital was in the mountains this cycle
People were very tired of mining basements due to all basalt
Meteor won this cycle even though Ice Forge, Hiogu and Jacco fought bravely to the end

TimelineEntries.Title: WT12
NotableEvents: After successful meteor shooting Dennis spawned another meteor along with a million otters

TimelineEntries.Title: WT11
NotableEvents: First WT. GORM Corp (gande octe rev megagroda) shot down the meteor
Kaapo built epic monument
Capital had severe chunk loading issues
